menus.Name: admin_menu
menus.Value:
MenuGroup(Title: Interface, Icon: "icon-screen-desktop"){
    MenuItem(
        Icon: "icon-screen-desktop",
        Page: "interfaces_list",
        Title: "Interface"
    )
    MenuItem(
        Icon: "fa fa-th",
        Page: "blocks_list",
        Title: "Blocks"
    )
    MenuItem(
        Icon: "fa fa-bars",
        Page: "menus_list",
        Title: "Menus"
    )
}
MenuItem(
    Icon: "icon-docs",
    Page: "tables_list",
    Title: "Tables"
)
MenuItem(
    Icon: "icon-briefcase",
    Page: "contracts_list",
    Title: "Smart Contracts"
)
MenuItem(
    Icon: "icon-settings",
    Page: "params_list",
    Title: "Ecosystem parameters"
)
MenuItem(
    Icon: "icon-globe",
    Page: "langres_list",
    Title: "Language resources"
)
MenuItem(
    Icon: "icon-cloud-upload",
    Page: "import",
    Title: "Import"
)
MenuItem(
    Icon: "icon-cloud-download",
    Page: "export",
    Title: "Export"
)
If("#key_id#" == EcosysParam("founder_account")){
    MenuItem(
        Icon: "icon-lock",
        Page: "vde",
        Title: "Dedicated Ecosystem"
    )
}
